#summary The Audio library is a really easy to use Interface for using OpenAL to play 3D audio

== Features ==
 * Ogg/Vorbis & Wave file loading
 * Different sound properties stored in [DeclFile .decl] files.

== List of authors ==
 * Santo Pfingsten ([http://sourceforge.net/users/ttk-bandit TTK-Bandit])

== Dependencies ==
 * [http://www.vorbis.com/ libOgg / libVorbis]
 * [http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/default.aspx OpenAL]
 * [LibraryCommon Common Library]
 * [LibraryFileSystem FileSystem Library]
